name: Temple Tumble
description:
Temple Tumble

You’ve found the hidden artifact! Now with the chalice in tow, try to make your way out of the collapsing temple while fighting off temple guardians. Be sure to watch your step!

Made for the LD 49 game jam: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/49/temple-tumble

Interested in our games? Check out our discord! https://t.co/HIBI04uJ5U?amp=1
